content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position x=0.0-2.0, y=0.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel and iron ore input
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel and iron ore input

### Copper Plate Production (Position x=4.0, y=4.0)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore to copper plates:
- Furnace 3 with coal fuel and copper ore input

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Automated assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-24.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access non-existent lab
- Ensure the lab entity exists at the specified position (x=0.5, y=28.5) before attempting to access it
- Verify the lab has been properly placed and initialized

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items
- Ensure sufficient coal is available when refueling furnaces and boilers
- Maintain adequate resource stocks for continuous operation

### Resource management issues
- Monitor coal levels to prevent power system and furnace shutdowns
- Keep track of ore supplies to maintain continuous production
- Balance resource distribution between different production processes
